metadata.description: Bat Boy! PhD Ape! Manigator! UFO Alien! Ed Anger, the columnist who sits to the far right of the far right! These and many other tabloid newspaper staples from the Weekly World News are featured in their first-ever miniseries. And they've got it rough from the start, as Chaos Cloud appears in "The Irredemption of Ed Anger."
metadata.name: Weekly World News
